text: This video can not be playedK-pop star Lee Ji Han was among the 158 people killed in the Itaewon crush on 29 October. He shot to fame after joining the second season of Produce 101, a popular reality show. In an exclusive interview with the BBC, his mother spoke about the pain of losing her son and what she wants the government to do next. Video by BBC Korean’s Woongbee Lee and Jungmin Choi.This video has been optimised for mobile viewing on the BBC News app. The BBC News app is available from the Apple App Store for iPhone and Google Play Store for Android.
title: Itaewon crush - Mother of K-pop star Lee Ji Han demands investigation
